ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T03:45:52 [Issue ID 4000-851724] urn:comicvine:4000-851724 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 21:10:12. [Issue ID 2223983]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Issue #18! Writer Tom Sniegoski continues to weave a post-apocalyptic tale featuring a literal hell on earth as a reborn Vampirella fights against the literal forces of chaos to save humanity from its ultimate destruction! Vampirella verses Nyx . . . Order verses Chaos . . . the fate of the world and all humanity hanging in the balance. This is what it has all been leading up to. The Beginning of the End!
